title: Blue
lyrics: Kyeou-ri ka- go bomi chajaojyo urin shideul-kou Keuri-um so- ge mami mongdu-rot-jyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) paran nun-mu- re paran sulpume gildulyojyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) tunkuru- me nallyobon- en sarang oh oh Gatun hanul darun gos nowahna wiihomhanik ka no-ye-geso tto- naju- neun goya Nimiran gul-jaye jomhana bikobhaji- man ne-ga monna sumnan goya Janinhan ibyo-run sarangye (mallo) ku eotteon- maldo wiiro twehl suneun opt- da-go A- ma nae insengye majimag mello magi naeryeo-neyo ije Teyonaso nol manna- go jugeul mankeum sarang-ha- go Parahke muldeu-reo shirin nae ma- eum nunul kamado nol nukgil su eoptjanha Kyeou-ri ka- go bomi chajaojyo urin shideul-kou Keuri-um so- ge mami mongdu-rot-jyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) paran nun-mu- re paran sulpume gildulyojyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) tunkuru- me nallyobon- en sarang oh oh Shimjangi mojun got man gata jonjengi kkunna- go ku kose o-ro bu-tun nowahna Nae morissok sekyojin tra-uma e nun-mul marumyon chokchokhi giyokhari nae sarang Kwehrob-jido wehrob- jido anha hengbo-geun da honjanmal ku isange bokjabhan gon- mot-chama Daesurob-ji amuroh-jido anha byol-su-om-nun bang-hwahng saramdu-run waht-da kanda Teyonaso nol manna- go jugeul mankeum sarang-ha- go Parahke muldu-ro shirin nae ma- eum nonun tteonado nan giidero it-janha Kyeou-ri ka- go bomi chajaoj- yo urin shideul-kou Keuri-um so- ge mami mongdu-rot-jyo Onuldo paran jo talbitare-ye na hollo chami dul-ket- jyo Kkumso-gese- odo nan giiderul chaja heme- imyo i norerul bu- lloyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) paran nun-mu- re paran sulpume gildulyojyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) tunkuru- me nallyobon- en sarang oh oh (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) paran nun-mu- re paran sulpume gildulyojyo (i'm singing my bluuuu- uues) tunkuru- me nallyobon- en sarang oh oh
